sentences.sContent: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.sCn: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

sentences.sContent: ...a diverse and vigorous economy attracted to the urban core has offered stable employment for residents...
...repeated across a dozen environmental issues and across our diverse planet...
...The merging of diverse peoples into a common mass has produced tension among members of the minorities and the majority alike...
...The traditional Chinese hospitality requires that the foods served be so diverse that guests cannot eat up all the dishes...
...People with disabilities comprise a large but diverse segment of the population...
...This is then coupled to a school's picture of what a diverse class should look like...
...Barack Obama assembled a racially and ideologically diverse coalition with his message of hope and change; as the reality of life under a new administration settles in...

synos.tran: 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的

remMethod.val: di(分开) ＋ vers(转) ＋ e → 转开 → 不一样的

words.tran: 分歧；分叉；意见不同；分支
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大
